show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 75 Felipe Villela, regenerating 1M ha of land worldwide by 2030 through agroforestry
subtitle: 75 Felipe Villela, regenerating 1M ha of land worldwide by 2030 through agroforestry
summary:
Listen to the podcast with Felipe Villela, co-founder of reNature, company working to regenerate nature through agroforestry together with corporates.

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.
Other ways to support our work:
- Share the podcast
- Give a 5-star rating
- Or buy us a coffee… or a meal!
www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture.

-----------------------------------------------------------

ReNature works across the globe on crops like cacao, coffee, citrus fruits, white pepper, rubber, leather and cotton, together with companies like Veja and other large corporates. Join me for a discussion on advanced syntropic agroforestry and how to change the extractive commodity crops causing deforestation.

Find all notes and show notes:
www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2020/03/09/felipe-villela/.
